title: Fit For the Future
creator_credit: Physical Education Branch, Visual Education Centre
brief_description: Shows the range of physical education activities provided in Victorian primary schools. Running, jumping, folk dancing, tumbling, team games and swimming are all encouraged so as to develop physical potential.
